original_text: But if he will not hear thee, then take with thee one or two more, that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.
korean_text: 만일 듣지 않거든 한두 사람을 데리고 가서 두세 증인의 입으로 말마다 확증하게 하라

sentences.original_text: But if he will not hear thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 너의 말을 듣지 않으면,

sentences.original_text: then take with thee one or two more,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너는 한두 사람을 더 데리고 가라,

sentences.original_text: that in the mouth of two or three witnesses
